title: SCOR MTB drops two (or four) new mountain bikes out of BMC skunkworks
content:
SCOR are a new Swiss mountain bike brand, developed by a skunkworks division inside BMC over the last three years by a team of engineers and riders. The brand, which sits within the BMC Group, is launching with two (OK, four) mountain bikes in 2021 â€“ the SCOR 4060 and the SCOR 4060 Z eMTB.

The post SCOR MTB drops two (or four) new mountain bikes out of BMC skunkworks appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
